document.full_text: hedge fund manager david einhorn is preparing to buy a large minority stake in the new york mets, a $200 million deal that could put him in a position to take control of the cash-strapped baseball team.
document.title: einhorn set to acquire ny mets stake for $200 million
lines_and_colors: hedge fund manager david einhorn is preparing to buy a large minority stake in the new york mets, a $200 million deal that could put him in a position to take control of the cash-strapped baseball team.
